title: Can't LOG IN to PBE
body: Whenever I try to log in to PBE, it says i have my username or password incorrect. Which I know I don't. I even tried to reset my password and it still won't work. Normal client works just fine with my username and ~~new~~ password

replies.body:
If you know that your login info is correct, there might be something that's blocking your network from reaching our login servers. It might be due to some kind of firewall or other setting preventing your connection from getting through. 

Let's be sure to hit all the most common causes by going over this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back if you still can't get signed in!

Still doesn't work. I've tried the firewall stuff and still nothing. And the Hextech Repair Tool won't let me choose the PBE server. It still says that my login information is wrong even though on the normal client everything is fine.

Be sure that you're using the login information for your PBE account and not your usual NA account since those could be different. If that's not the issue, hit us up in [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look!
